mapper.sql: MSGID, TXNID, CHLNAME, EFFECTDATE, EXPIREDATE, UPDATE_USERID, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into ENCCTL (MSGID, TXNID, CHLNAME, EFFECTDATE, EXPIREDATE, UPDATE_USERID, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chlname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiredate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

TXNID,

EFFECTDATE,
EXPIREDATE,
UPDATE_USERID,
UPDATE_TIME,
